overview: The "Meeting of Styles" is an international festival which was founded in Wiesbaden, Germany, in 1997. It has been held over 400 times worldwide. Artist from all ove rthe world travel to the event locations to put their ar on the walls. Most of the street art in this film are the results of the festival that took place from June 16-19, 2022 in Wiesbaden.
title: Meeting of Styles
